article: How to Play Hide and Seek
intro: In Hide and Go Seek, players run and hide before another player tries to find them. It’s perfect for a rainy afternoon indoors, or a sunny day in a big yard or a park. The rules are simple, but there are countless variations to try with your friends. We’ll show you how to play a standard game of Hide and Go Seek, then show you some ways to mix up the rules for maximum fun.

steps.title: Play a new round with a new seeker.
steps.subtitle: Usually, the player who was found first becomes the seeker in the next round. The new seeker counts, everyone else hides, and the game starts again.
sub-points: Feel free to make new rules each round to make the game more fun. For example, set a time limit for the seeker, or let the found players help the seeker find other players.
